response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for someone like yourself. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and aspirations, is worth $1,500,000 to you based on my understanding of your requirements and goals. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000, reflecting its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it provides.

I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, contributing significantly to your success and satisfaction. Please consider this offer carefully and let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product's features and capabilities.

Looking forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
